attributes.additional_details:
The self employed will simply struggle on £94 a week. 
We need more help than this! 

We deserve the same, if not more than those who are employed. 

How would will survive financially? 
Not forgetting our mental health
Due to loss of earnings.

We simply need more help from the government. 

Instead we have been forgotten about!!!

Please help us self employed workers get the help we rightly deserve.

We need you now more than ever.
attributes.background:
THE SELF EMPLOYED!!
 
We have been completely forgotten about!

£94 a week is not going to help us.

We deserve the same, if not more than those who are employed. 

Its disgusting how we have been treated!!!

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced support for self-employed individuals: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/chancellor-gives-support-to-millions-of-self-employed-individuals

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
